meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>direction</kanji> <kanji>yonder</kanji> over there is still just the <vocabulary>direction</vocabulary> of something, though a complicated way to say it, I think. This direction is the "what direction did he go in?" sort of direction.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
